name: European Meat Network
goal:
EMN is a non-profit network composed of the most important European slaughtering companies involved in the slaughtering and processing of beef, pork, lamb and poultry meat.
The purpose of EMN is to strengthen the long term position of the European meat sector, to create a forum for discussions on developments in relation to the regulatory status of meat and meat products within the European Union and in relation to third countries; to create a forum for discussions on technical and other similar developments within the meat industry and in relation to other relevant economic sectors.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives:
meat market developments, CAP (Common Agriculture Policy) rules
SPS rules, animal welfare rules, ongoing bilateral and international trade negotiations (e.g.: FTAs)
